mail.title: Moving Domains!
mail.text: Hey GeoMusic subscribers!! As a heads up, we will be moving domains to 'http://www.geomusic.net/' starting next week!!

mail.title: Security Alert!!
mail.text: Your computer has recent visited a site that has has been reported to infect users!! To solve this issue, click here.

mail.title: Verify Account
mail.text: You've recently set up an account with us. To begin creating and hosting your site, please verify here: Verify Account

mail.title: Thank you!!
mail.text: Thank you for joining the Silver Moon mailing list!! Any important updates to the site or series will now appear in your inbox (assuming i keep on top of things).

mail.title: KONNICHIWA
mail.text: Welcome to the moemoe radio mailing list! Updates to the site will be delivered straight to your inbox from now on, or you can just send a message back and we can talk!!

mail.title: Daily Funny Mail Is Here!
mail.text: Hope this gives you a chuckle!

mail.title: Welcome to Inbox!
mail.text: Welcome to Inbox! If you're reading this, you're already ready to use Inbox. Simply begin by subscribing to mailing lists on your browser, and new emails will appear at the bottom of your list.
